languages.text: "Но зачем лично, и главное — какой ценой?"
"But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"
languages.original_text: "Но зачем лично, и главное — какой ценой?"

traits.locale_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “但这个问题为什么一定要您亲手解决？而且您有没有考虑过，这么做可能会让您付出怎样的代价？”
languages.original_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"

traits.locale_text: “但这个问题为什么一定要您亲手解决？而且您有没有考虑过，这么做可能会让您付出怎样的代价？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Pero ¿por qué debía hacerlo en persona? ¿Llegó a pensar en lo que podría costarle?».
languages.original_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿por qué debía hacerlo en persona? ¿Llegó a pensar en lo que podría costarle?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ですが、なぜあなたがそれをせねばならなかったのです？その代償は考慮されたのですか？」
languages.original_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、なぜあなたがそれをせねばならなかったのです？その代償は考慮されたのですか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Aber warum musstet Ihr es tun? Und habt Ihr einmal überlegt, was Euch das kosten könnte?"
languages.original_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"

traits.locale_text: "Aber warum musstet Ihr es tun? Und habt Ihr einmal überlegt, was Euch das kosten könnte?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Mais pourquoi a-t-il fallu que vous vous en mêliez personnellement ? Avez-vous réfléchi une seule seconde à ce que ça aurait pu vous coûter ? »
languages.original_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais pourquoi a-t-il fallu que vous vous en mêliez personnellement ? Avez-vous réfléchi une seule seconde à ce que ça aurait pu vous coûter ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Neden kendiniz çözmeyi seçtiniz? Bedelinin ne olacağını düşündünüz mü hiç?"
languages.original_text: "But why did you have to be the one to do it? And did you consider what it might cost you?"

traits.locale_text: "Neden kendiniz çözmeyi seçtiniz? Bedelinin ne olacağını düşündünüz mü hiç?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
